content: BE INSPIRED BY COMMUNITYModden “beyond forum” is the first cryptocurrency forum with its own blockchain based on PoS.Share your opinion, solve your doubts and contribute adding new content while receivingpassive income from our Masternodes & Staking.“There are people who see innovation as a change,but we have never seen it like that.It's really about making things better.”Official LinksWebsitehttps://modden.io/Discordhttps://discord.com/invite/V5HSbJZ4j7Twitterhttps://twitter.com/ModdencoinExplorerhttps://explorer.modden.io/Wallethttps://github.com/ModdenBF/Modden/releases/latestGithubhttps://github.com/ModdenBF/ModdenPartnersPecuniahttps://pecuniaplatform.io/coin-stats/moddenMyMasternodes.Hosthttps://www.mymasternodes.host/deployprep?ticker=MDDNNodeStatshttps://nodestats.info/default.php?coin=mddnihostmnhttps://ihostmn.com/explorerinfo.php?coin=MDDNBirakehttps://trade.birake.com/market/BIRAKE.MDDN_BIRAKE.BTC
